version_description:
Hi there!

Thanks so much for using AirBrush! We’re constantly working to optimize your experience, and will let you know whenever new features become available.

We really appreciate your feedback, so if you have any comments, suggestions or questions, please leave us a review; or if you prefer, you can always email us at support@appairbrush.com. Thank you!

- 新增！【工具】模块上线，所有图片编辑的必备功能，都可以在这里找到
- 新增！【增强】功能全新加入：对比度，锐化，饱和度，高光，阴影，亮度，色温，褪色
- UX/UI优化：将现有的编辑功能（暗角，虚化，裁剪旋转）移到【工具】中

有意见或建议的宝宝记得到“意见反馈”找wuli技术欧巴哦~或者您也可以发送邮件至support@appairbrush.com。谢谢！

- NEW – Added “Tools” section which includes existing and new editing features
- NEW – Added photo editing features: Contrast, Sharpen, Saturation, Highlights, Shadows, Brightness, Temperature and Fade
- Optimized UX/UI by moving existing editing features (Vignette, Blur, Crop and Rotate) into the new “Tools” section

We really appreciate your feedback, so if you have any comments, suggestions or questions, please leave us a review; or if you prefer, you can always email us at support@appairbrush.com. Thank you!

- Redesigned “Save and Share” page for a more streamlined user experience.
- Improved functionality of the “Acne” feature.

We really appreciate your feedback, so if you have any comments, suggestions or questions, please leave us a review; or if you prefer, you can always email us at support@appairbrush.com. Thank you!

- Introducing AirBrush BLACK! Unlimited use of ALL your favorite features and filters via subscription, plus two new exclusive filters and a no-ads experience.

Introducing AirBrush BLACK! Unlimited use of ALL your favorite features and filters via subscription, plus two new exclusive filters and a no-ads experience.

PS:
- If you are having difficulties purchasing premium features, please update to the latest app version (v4.0 or newer).
- All previously purchased in-app features will continue to work (and remain free) after updating the app.

- New! "Grain" and "Prism" features inside the "Enhance" tool - achieve a film-like effect on any photo you take, or add beautiful reflections of light to your photos.
- Improved! Beauty Magic - now you can edit as you go and view results in real-time. A new Teeth Whitening effect has also been added.

You can now build your personal retouch kit!
Our new "My Kit" feature lets you add all your favorite features, filters and makeup looks into one place, so that you can have them ready to go!

Welcome to Beauty Magic 2.0! Smooth, Acne, Dark Circles... same FREE features that we all love, and now with even better results! Besides, AirBrush BLACK members can now enjoy some of our newly added Magic features, too!

PS: If you wish to keep using Beauty Magic for FREE, simply turn off all the newly added AirBrush BLACK features, and you won't be charged.

PS: If you wish to keep using Beauty Magic for FREE, simply turn off all the newly added AirBrush BLACK features, and you won't be charged.
New! Matte joins our collection together with our improved selfie speed! Remove shiny spots, adding smooth detail to your pics!

Thank you for using AirBrush! We’re constantly working to optimize your experience, and this release contains some bug fixes and performance improvements.

We really appreciate your feedback. If you have any comments, questions, or suggestions, feel free to email us at support@appairbrush.com.

Thank you!

- New export option! Now you can export your perfect photos with even higher resolution! (Only for iPhone 6s and later devices.)
- You can now start editing your photos with AirBrush directly from within the iOS Photos - simply tap "Edit" > "..." > "More", and find AirBrush in the list!

Hi there!

Thanks so much for using AirBrush! We’re constantly working to optimize your experience, and will let you know whenever new features become available.

We really appreciate your feedback, so if you have any comments, suggestions or questions, please leave us a review; or if you prefer, you can always email us at support@appairbrush.com. Thank you!

- New! "Grain" and "Prism" features inside the "Enhance" tool - achieve a film-like effect on any photo you take, or add beautiful reflections of light to your photos.
- Improved! Beauty Magic - now you can edit as you go and view results in real-time. A new Teeth Whitening effect has also been added.

- New! "Relight" feature - instantly correct lighting and exposure for the perfect selfie.
- New! Gridlines feature - now you can take selfies with the perfect composition.
- Improved! Dark Circles - get more natural, textured results.

- New! "Colors" feature - Make your photos pop with the color of your choice.
- New! "Smart Select" feature in "Bokeh" - Smarter and more precise bokeh effect by selecting the areas you do not want to blur.

- New! "Colors" feature - Make your photos pop with the color of your choice.
- New! "Smart Select" feature in "Bokeh" - Smarter and more precise bokeh effect by selecting the areas you do not want to blur.

- New! "Colors" feature - Make your photos pop with the color of your choice.
- New! "Smart Select" feature in "Bokeh" - Smarter and more precise bokeh effect by selecting the areas you do not want to blur.

- New! "Highlighter" feature - Add a radiant flush of color to your skin, to create a sheer, natural glow—effortlessly.
PS:
- If you are having difficulties purchasing premium features, please update to the latest app version (v4.0 or newer).
- All previously purchased in-app features will continue to work (and remain free) after updating the app. Make sure to restore your purchases through “Settings” in the app.
- New! "Glitter" feature - Shine bright like a diamond and dance the night away with your choice of glitter.
- New! "Glitter" feature - Shine bright like a diamond and dance the night away with your choice of glitter.
- New makeup looks available! We've added a collection of makeup styles that will elevate your natural beauty.

- New makeup looks available! We've added a collection of makeup styles that will elevate your natural beauty.
- Bug fixes and performance improvements
- 「美妆」新增「专属妆容」，各种妆容部位任意搭配，打造你的专属妆容！保存一次后即可随时使用。
- New! Change App Language - Now you can change the app language directly inside the AirBrush app. We currently support English, Russian, Spanish, Portuguese, German and Chinese.
- New! "My Look" inside the Makeup tool - Mix and match what you like most to create your own makeup look. Save it for future use!

Hi there!

Thanks so much for using AirBrush! We’re constantly working to optimize your experience, and will let you know whenever new features become available.

We really appreciate your feedback, so if you have any comments, suggestions or questions, please leave us a review; or if you prefer, you can always email us at support@appairbrush.com. Thank you!
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

- New! Get your eyebrows on fleek! Gain precise control over your brows inside the "Sculpt" tool, with "Volume", "Lift", "Distance", "Tilt" and "Shape".
- As a thank-you gift for our subscribers, we added in a newly-designed VIP app icon - if you are a subscriber, you can switch to VIP icon in "Settings"!

- New! Get your eyebrows on fleek! Gain precise control over your brows inside the "Sculpt" tool, with "Volume", "Lift", "Distance", "Tilt" and "Shape".
- As a thank-you gift for our subscribers, we added in a newly-designed VIP app icon - if you are a subscriber, you can switch to VIP icon in "Settings"!

- New! Get your eyebrows on fleek! Gain precise control over your brows inside the "Sculpt" tool, with "Volume", "Lift", "Distance","Tilt" and "Shape".
- As a thank-you gift for our subscribers, we added in a newly-designed VIP app icon. If you are a subscriber, you can switch to VIP icon in "Settings"!
New! Eraser feature lets you magically remove any unwanted object in your photo. You can find it in Tools.

Thank you for using AirBrush! We’re constantly working to optimize your experience, and this release contains some bug fixes and performance improvements.

We really appreciate your feedback. If you have any comments, questions, or suggestions, please leave us a review; or if you prefer, you can always email us at support@appairbrush.com.

Thank you for using AirBrush! We’re constantly working to optimize your experience, and this release contains some bug fixes and performance improvements.

We really appreciate your feedback. If you have any comments, questions, or suggestions, feel free to email us at support@appairbrush.com.

Thank you!

Welcome to Beauty Magic 2.0! Smooth, Acne, Dark Circles... same FREE features that we all love, and now with even better results! Besides, AirBrush BLACK members can now enjoy some of our newly added Magic features, too!

PS: If you wish to keep using Beauty Magic for FREE, simply turn off all the newly added AirBrush BLACK features, and you won't be charged.

Our new "My Kit" feature lets you add all your favorite features, filters and makeup looks into one place, so that you can have them ready to go!

- "Enhance" has been optimised so that you can now have more control with our new brush and eraser option!"

*NEW* Skin Tone editing features for AirBrush BLACK subscribers! Now you can match and add colors using the eyedropper and color palette!
NEW and improved Stretch tool! We've enhanced our Stretch feature based on your comments! Now you can stretch your photos not just vertically, but horizontally!
NEW and improved Stretch tool! We've enhanced our Stretch feature based on your comments! Now you can stretch your photos not just vertically, but horizontally!
We've added new photo saving options to help you better organize your edits! Now, your edited photos can be saved not only as new but also to the date they were taken in your gallery!
Eggnog anyone? ... too soon? We're just very excited for the holiday season! Oh and we've made some bug fixes.
The holidays are coming and we've got presents (and eggnog) for you! Introducing our new and improved Sculpt 2.0 feature with enhanced editing and a new free 3D Reshape effect!
Whether you've been naughty or nice this year, we've made some bug fixes and improvements for you!
We've got presents for you! Kick off 2021 with a smile with our new Teeth feature! Now you can Whiten and also straighten your teeth with the Align tool. Wishing you a happy holiday and new year!

Happy New Year! We've made some bug fixes. Also, make sure to check out our new 'Teeth' feature to Whiten and Align your smile in a tap! Thanks for using our app. We're excited for a new year of beautiful photos with you!
We've got that fresh new year feeling! Look out for new tools and bug fixes to edit your photos for a fresh start in 2021.
Love is in the air... we've made some bug fixes and performance updates because we adore you! Thanks for using our app. xoxo.
Love is in the air... we've made some bug fixes and performance updates because we adore you! Thanks for using our app. xoxo.
Get effortlessly flawless skin with our *new* Foundation tool! Conceal wrinkles, blemishes and even out your skin tone in just a few taps.
Get effortlessly flawless skin with our *new* Foundation tool! Conceal wrinkles, blemishes and even out your skin tone in just a few taps.
Presenting Relight 2.0! We've updated our Relight feature to include 3D lighting presets that enhance the brightness, hue and softness of your photos.
We've got that fresh spring feeling! Keep an eye out for new updates coming your way. In the meantime, we've made some bug fixes.

Presenting a makeup tool upgrade! Now you have the ability to apply makeup items separately, for example you can choose to apply only lipstick. Additionally, you can also create up to 10 customized looks and save the best makeup looks to “Favorites”.
